Subject: Cant Upgrade or Remove Agent
Description: On a Client we have the Problem, that we cant upgrade the Agent to 6.2.4 or remove them. dll not found. Give it a cleanup Script to do this? Seems the old Version block the Win11 Upgrade.
What_We_Know__c:
05.05
- the customer is having issues upgrading/uninstalling the EPP client
- asked for more details + screenshot

06.05
- the uninstallation/upgrade fails on only 1 pc
- the client version is 6.0.1.6
- asked for a remote session to uninstall it during the call
- scheduled the RS on the 8th

08.05
- we removed the EPP client with the ZAP tool and deleted it after
Next_Steps__c:
05.05
- waiting on the customer

06.05
- waiting on the customer to schedule the RS
- waiting on RS to uninstall the client

08.05

Solution_Comment__c: we managed to uninstall the EPP client with the zap tool, which was removed completely afterwards
